snippet: MAIDMAN--Gail. We have lost the most beautiful, kindhearted and generous friend. There will never be another Gail. Our deepest condolences to Richard, Starr, Jacques, Evan and Regina. Lorraine and Herbert Podell Allison and Brad Saft 1/3
lead_paragraph: MAIDMAN--Gail. We have lost the most beautiful, kindhearted and generous friend. There will never be another Gail. Our deepest condolences to Richard, Starr, Jacques, Evan and Regina. Lorraine and Herbert Podell Allison and Brad Saft 1/3
